doc.$$: Same replacement. same as the core_arg dict
doc.$A$: Replacement. replace $A with value of A, i.e. f'{A}'
doc.$!$A$+1: (only at the beginning) Small evaluation. evaluate $!$A$+1 with eval($A$ + 1), operators only allowed: + - * // % [] .len
doc.\\\\: Escape. (only in the value) real \ (this is for using \ and $ together. use \ normally is also valid)
